content: CFS-DID Drop-in device One-step firestop cast-in solution for pipe floor penetrations ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop devices and sleeves- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick and simple installation – designed to increase your productivity and reduce labor costs Peace of mind – cast-in devices remove scope for errors compared to traditional methods, leading to more reliable firestopping of vertical penetrations All-in-one solution for renovation, retrofit and new construction Versatile – suitable for multiple base materials (concrete, hollow core and metal deck) Applications One-step firestop solution for plastic, metal and insulated metal pipes through cored or sleeved holes For use in concrete, hollow core and concrete-over metal deck slab thicknesses from 2-1/2 to 12-1/2 Suitable for use in renovation as well as new construction For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: LEED VOC: 0.19 g/l W-rating: Yes, with W-rating module Application temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Technical Data | LEED VOC | 0.19 g/l | W-rating | Yes, with W-rating module | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2008251 - Drop-In device CFS-DID 2 MD - Package Size 1 pc - 2008254 - Drop-In device CFS-DID 2 HC8 - Package Size 1 pc - 2008252 - Drop-In device CFS-DID 3 MD - Package Size 1 pc - 2008255 - Drop-In device CFS-DID 3 HC8 - Package Size 1 pc - 2008253 - Drop-In device CFS-DID 4 MD - Package Size 1 pc - 2008256 - Drop-In device CFS-DID 4 HC8 - Package Size 1 pc - 2015574 - Drop-In device CFS-DID 6 MD - Package Size 1 pc
